channels.name: ‚åõ-how-to-play
channels.topic: Want to know what Cyclic is all about? You've come to the right place.

embeds.title: So, what is Assassin?
embeds.description:
Assassin is a live-action game in which players try to eliminate one another using mock kill methods, in an effort to become the last surviving player.
⠀

fields.name: 1. Each of you receive a target.
fields.value:
You must eliminate your target through various mock kill methods.
⠀

fields.name: 2. Assassinating your target removes them from the game.
fields.value:
If you successfully assassinate your target, you receive a __*reward*__ and a new target (your target's former target).
⠀

fields.name: 3. Avoid being assassinated.
fields.value:
Keep a watchful eye for your unknown assassin. (it could be anyone)
⠀

fields.name: 4. Take part in the weekly Town Hall phase.
fields.value:
During the Town Hall phase `(Sunday 00:00 CDT -> 23:59 CDT)`, you can create and vote on proposals to add, modify, or remove rules or kill methods.
⠀

fields.name: 5. The game ends after all players except one are eliminated.
fields.value:
After which the champion, top killers, and voting participants receive rewards.
⠀

channels.name: üìã-rules
channels.topic: Full information on the rules of the active Cyclic game.

embeds.title: Kill Methods Information
embeds.description:
How you can eliminate other players from the game.
⠀

fields.name: 1. Choose a kill method from the kill methods list below
fields.value:
New kill methods could be introduced or removed later, so ensure you check the list! (it's timestamped)
⠀

fields.name: 2. Perform the necessary specification while recording a video and all events should be in one video.
fields.value:
Make sure this video includes proof that it is you recording.
⠀

fields.name: 3. Confirm your kill/death on the website! *http://www.cyclic.games/*
fields.value:
Make sure BOTH parties confirm the kill (Assassin and target)
⠀

fields.name: 4. Follow the directions for the kill **exactly**.
fields.value:
Violating any part of the instructions for a kill method could result in the kill being invalid.
⠀

embeds.title: Kill Methods List
embeds.description:
**Safe Zones:**
You cannot be assassinated while sleeping or be woken up to be assassinated
The bathroom nearest to your dorm room or apartment is a safe zone
⠀

fields.name: 1. Doorway Trapped
fields.value:
Record your target opening, entering, and closing a door without them noticing you from a distance of at most 10 feet.
⠀

fields.name: 2. Midnight Detonation
fields.value:
Record yourself entering your target's dorm room or apartment and placing a piece of paper labeled "bomb" on their pillow.
You can only enter their room if given explicit permission and someone is in the room.
Make sure to record the room number as proof that this is indeed their room.
⠀

fields.name: 3. Food Poisoning
fields.value:
Place a piece of paper labeled "cyanide" under your target's food plate (while taking video).
Your target is assassinated if they take a bite before noticing. 
⠀

fields.name: 4. Identity Theft
fields.value:
Record a video of your target's I-Card or other photo ID next to your I-Card or other photo ID.
Moderators must be able to recognize both faces and names on the cards. 
⠀

fields.name: 5. Duel
fields.value:
You and another player that is not necessarily your target can choose to challenge each other to a duel with any rules of your choice.
 For more information, check out the #üî™-duel channel!
⠀

channels.name: üì£-announcements
channels.topic: Announcements about the active Cyclic game are here!

channels.name: üî™-duel
channels.topic: Discuss duels with other players and moderators.

embeds.title: Duels
embeds.description:
Duels are a special way to break stalemates and get around traditional kill methods in Cyclic Games Assassin.
⠀

fields.name: 1. Challenge someone to a duel
fields.value:
You and any other living player in the game can choose to challenge each other to a duel with any rules of your choice.
Any rules are fair game, as long as you both agree to them.
⠀

fields.name: 2. Play out the duel with moderator supervision or record the event
fields.value:
Whoever wins the duel, by the judgment of the chosen moderator, will assassinate the other player (but will not gain the assassinated player's target if they didn't have them as a target when the duel started).
⠀

fields.name: 3. Use this channel to coordinate
fields.value:
Make sure you have proof of both parties agreeing to the terms of the duel.
⠀
